.. currentmodule:: wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers

.. highlight:: python



.. _wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.ChoiceDialogHandler:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.ChoiceDialogHandler**
==========================================================================================================================================

Supports saving/restoring a :class:`MultiChoiceDialog` / :class:`SingleChoiceDialog` choices.

This class handles the following wxPython widgets:

- :class:`SingleChoiceDialog`;
- :class:`MultiChoiceDialog`.



|

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: ChoiceDialogHandler(TLWHandler)

   Supports saving/restoring a :class:`MultiChoiceDialog` / :class:`SingleChoiceDialog` choices.
   
   This class handles the following wxPython widgets:
   
   - :class:`SingleChoiceDialog`;
   - :class:`MultiChoiceDialog`.
